body:
Hi, I am not sure if this happens to be related to #5281 #5190 but R packages that require jpeg no longer work:

```
[root@node141 spack]# git log | head
commit feefdedadf224315d69ef2f6da1fafd6338bba5a
Author: Christoph Junghans <christoph.junghans@gmail.com>
Date:   Tue Sep 5 13:15:08 2017 -0600

    nauty: shared libraries (#5207)

commit 41d8981ab5b5e912d38e201b71b981ef0f17e20e
Author: Massimiliano Culpo <massimiliano.culpo@googlemail.com>
Date:   Tue Sep 5 17:15:25 2017 +0200
```

```
[root@node141 spack]# spack load -r r-zoo
==> Error: Package jpeg not found.
```

```
[root@node141 spack]# spack find | grep jpeg
libjpeg-turbo@1.5.0
jpeg@9b
libjpeg-turbo@1.5.0
r-jpeg@0.1-8
```
Concreteization works though I see:

```
[root@node141 spack]# spack -d load -r r-zoo                                                                                                                                                                                                  
==> READ LOCK: /pbtech_mounts/softlib001/apps/EL6/spack/opt/spack/.spack-db/lock[0:0] [Acquiring]
==> READ LOCK: /pbtech_mounts/softlib001/apps/EL6/spack/opt/spack/.spack-db/lock[0:0] [Acquired]
==> READ LOCK: /pbtech_mounts/softlib001/apps/EL6/spack/opt/spack/.spack-db/lock[0:0] [Released]
==> Error: Package jpeg not found.
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/pbtech_mounts/softlib001/apps/EL6/spack/lib/spack/spack/main.py", line 440, in _main
    return _invoke_spack_command(command, parser, args, unknown_args)
  File "/pbtech_mounts/softlib001/apps/EL6/spack/lib/spack/spack/main.py", line 356, in _invoke_spack_command
    return_val = command(parser, args)
  File "/pbtech_mounts/softlib001/apps/EL6/spack/lib/spack/spack/cmd/module.py", line 267, in module
    callbacks[args.subparser_name](module_type, specs, args)
  File "/pbtech_mounts/softlib001/apps/EL6/spack/lib/spack/spack/cmd/module.py", line 134, in loads
    for spec in specs if os.path.exists(module_cls(spec).file_name)]
  File "/pbtech_mounts/softlib001/apps/EL6/spack/lib/spack/spack/modules.py", line 265, in __init__
    self.pkg = spec.package  # Just stored for convenience
  File "/pbtech_mounts/softlib001/apps/EL6/spack/lib/spack/spack/spec.py", line 1291, in package
    return spack.repo.get(self)
  File "/pbtech_mounts/softlib001/apps/EL6/spack/lib/spack/spack/repository.py", line 74, in converter
    return function(self, spec_like, *args, **kwargs)
  File "/pbtech_mounts/softlib001/apps/EL6/spack/lib/spack/spack/repository.py", line 317, in get
    return self.repo_for_pkg(spec).get(spec)
  File "/pbtech_mounts/softlib001/apps/EL6/spack/lib/spack/spack/repository.py", line 74, in converter
    return function(self, spec_like, *args, **kwargs)
  File "/pbtech_mounts/softlib001/apps/EL6/spack/lib/spack/spack/repository.py", line 567, in get
    raise UnknownPackageError(spec.name)
spack.repository.UnknownPackageError: Package jpeg not found.
```

This still works on my testing branch which is from way back in June.


```
[root@node141 spack]# git branch
  develop
  master
* testing
[root@node141 spack]# git log | head

commit 7d59197b7b056ce4525b3faccdcaa7f06519c886
Author: Douglas Duckworth <quackmaster@protonmail.com>
Date:   Thu Jun 29 14:42:56 2017 -0400

    added numpy 1.13 - modified albacore to use 1.13 (#4639)
    
    * albacore 1.24 requires numpy 1.13 - added numpy 1.13
    
    * added numpy 1.13
```
title: installed package jpeg not found
